tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE shift_schedule (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT NOT NULL,
  shift_date DATE NOT NULL,
  shift_start_time TIME NOT NULL,
  shift_end_time TIME NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  is_remote BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE shifts (
    shift_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    shift_date DATE,
    shift_start_time TIME,
    shift_end_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE work_assignments (
    assignment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    assignment_date DATE,
    is_remote BOOLEAN,
    assignment_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ShiftChanges (
  shift_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  shift_date DATE NOT NULL,
  employee_id INT NOT NULL,
  new_shift_start_time TIME NOT NULL,
  new_shift_end_time TIME NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE RemoteWorkAssignments (
  assignment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  assignment_date DATE NOT NULL,
  employee_id INT NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE NOT NULL,
  end_date DATE NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Employees (
  employee_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  department VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  position VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  remote_work_status BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE
);

CREATE TABLE shift_schedule (
    shift_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    shift_date DATE,
    shift_start_time TIME,
    shift_end_time TIME,
    shift_location VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE work_assignments (
    assignment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    assignment_type VARCHAR(255),
    assignment_date DATE,
    assignment_deadline DATE,
    is_completed BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE remote_work_requests (
    request_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    request_reason TEXT,
    request_date DATE,
    request_status VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE shifts_changes (
    change_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    shift_id INT,
    new_employee_id INT,
    change_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (shift_id) REFERENCES shifts(shift_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (new_employee_id) REFERENCES employees(employee_id)
);

CREATE TABLE remote_work_assignments (
    assignment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE NOT NULL,
    notes TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES employees(employee_id)
);
